If NOD32 picked up a virus it may be a false positive. It a very good antivirus program, but it does happen from time to time. Would rather get a false positive, than have it miss an actual virus. Keep an eye on your firewall logs for anything out of the ordinary, and double check with another mfg software. & as always google what it thinks it found. Thanks for the Up
